title: Louder Than Words. Official Movie Trailer [HD]
description:
In theaters: August 1st, 2014

Description:

This inspiring film, based on a true story, finds a couple, John (David Duchovny) and Brenda (Hope Davis) trying to put their life together after the tragic death of their young daughter, Maria (Olivia Steele-Falconer). Instead of being torn apart by their tragedy, John and Brenda celebrate their very special daughter and help thousands of children and their families.

Director: Anthony Fabian

Writers: Benjamin Chapin
